# cameraCaptureMode

**Instance Property**

The capture mode used by the camera.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var cameraCaptureMode: UIImagePickerController.CameraCaptureMode { get set }
```

## Discussion

The various capture modes are listed in the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIImagePickerController/CameraCaptureMode-swift.enum] enumeration. The default value is [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIImagePickerController/CameraCaptureMode-swift.enum/photo].

## Related Documentation

- **cameraDevice**: The camera used by the image picker controller.

## Configuring the camera capture mode

- **availableCaptureModes(for:)**: Retrieves the capture modes supported by the specified camera device.
- **UIImagePickerController.CameraCaptureMode**: Constants that specify the category of media for the camera to capture.
